text.div:
VhDir Insurance Plan Benefit Type

This value set defines a set of codes that indicate the benefit type of a plan.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/CodeSystem/insuranceplan
    CodeDisplay
    preventativePreventativePreventative
    primarycareovPrimary care office visitPrimary care office visit
    specialityovSpeciality care office visitSpeciality care office visit
    hospitalizationHospitalizationHospitalization
    emergencyroomEmergency roomEmergency room
    urgentcareUrgent careUrgent care

name: VhDirInsPlanBenefitType
title: VhDir Insurance Plan Benefit Type
description: This value set defines a set of codes that indicate the benefit type of a plan.
